Amplify.description: When you play a nonconstant function, this temporarily gets boost 1.

Boost.description: This entity gets N more attack and defense.

Chain.description: While you have played another function this turn, add this effect.

Surge.description: This triggers when you activate your power.

Deploy.description: This triggers when this appear on the planet.

Despawn.description: This triggers when this is put into a cache from the planet.

Encrypt.description: This constant can't targeted by actions.

Erase.description: Put the top N cards of a deck into its owner's cache.

Exploit.description: (This triggers when this entity deals battle damage to an opponent.)

Firewall {Cost}.description: When this becomes targeted by an action, cancel that action unless its controller pays {Cost}.

Flight.description: This entity can only be defended by entities with flight or intercept.

Hack.description: Unlock an entity, then temporarily take control of it. It temporarily gains rapid.
Hack.reminder syntax: Unlock it, then temporarily take control of it. It temporarily gains rapid.

Hologram.description: Spawns a copy of an entity. Archive it at the end of your next turn.

Initialize.description: Terminate all alterations on a constant.

Initiate.description: This effect triggers whenever this entity attacks.

Intercept.description: This entity can defend entities with flight.

Leech.description: When this deals damage, you gain that much health.

Network.description: Lock any number of unlocked constants you control. For each, this costs {1} less to play.

Nullify.description: Put the top N cards of a deck into its owner's archive.

Overclock.description: Increase the speed of a function by 1.

Overpowered.description: When this deals damage to an enemy entity, excess damage is dealt to the entity's controller.

Rapid.description: This can lock the turn it appear on the planet.

Scan.description: Look at the top N cards of your deck, then put any number of them on the bottom of your deck and the rest on top in any order.

Secure.description: This entity does not lock when attacking.

Shield.description: If this entity would be terminated, or dealt damage, instead it loses shield.

Quick strike.description: This entity deals battle damage before other entities.

Swap.description: Discard this card, draw a card.

Threat.description: This entity must be defended by at least two entities.

Virus.description: This only needs to deal one damage to entities to terminate them.

Wormhole.description: While you have played another event this turn, you may play this from your cache. If you do, archive it as it resolves.

Intimidate.description: This entity can't be defended by defenders with less attack.
